name: Multi Kafka CDC to BigQuery
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads JSON encoded CDC messages from Kafka, transform data by Javascript UDF function, and writes the results to a BigQuery

parameters.name: bootstrapServers
parameters.label: Kafka Bootstrap Server
parameters.helpText: Comma separated list of bootstrap servers.

parameters.name: inputTopicRegex
parameters.label: Input Topic Regex
parameters.helpText: Regular Expression of Kafka topics to read from.

parameters.name: outputTablePrefix
parameters.label: BigQuery output table prefix (project and dataset name)

parameters.name: outputTableReplacement
parameters.label: Output Table Replacement
parameters.helpText: Replacement from inputTopicRegex to be applied in BigQuery table name.

parameters.name: javascriptTextTransformGcsPath
parameters.label: Javascript Function Path
parameters.helpText: Path to javascript function in GCS.
